1: -module(dialyzer_cl_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("dialyzer/src/dialyzer.hrl").
    6: 
    7: %% Test server specific exports
    8: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
    9: 
   10: %% Test cases must be exported.
   11: -export([
   12:     can_add_multiple_plts_to_another_plt/1,
   13:     unknown_function_warning_includes_callsite/1,
   14:     call_to_missing_warning_includes_callsite/1
   15: ]).
   16: 
   17: suite() -> [{timetrap, {minutes, 3}}].
   18: 
   19: all() ->
   20:     [
   21:         can_add_multiple_plts_to_another_plt,
   22:         unknown_function_warning_includes_callsite,
   23:         call_to_missing_warning_includes_callsite
   24:     ].
   25: 
   26: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   27:     %% Prime PLT with common stuff so we don't get errors about get_module_info
   28:     %% being unknown, etc.
   29:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
   30:     PltBase = plt_base_file(PrivDir),
   31:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
   32:                       {apps, [erts]},
   33:                       {output_plt, PltBase}]),
   34:     Config.
   35: 
   36: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   37:     Config.
   38: 
   39: plt_base_file(PrivDir) ->
   40:     filename:join(PrivDir, "dialyzer_cl_base.plt").
   41: 
   42: %%%
   43: %%% Test cases starts here.
   44: %%%
   45: 
   46: %% Test running Dialyzer programatically can yield call to missing
   47: %% errors with information on both the callsite and the unknown call
   48: %% itself.
   49: %% Missing function logic is tested elsewhere, but here we're specifically
   50: %% interested in the details of the error that are accessible from the
   51: %% dialyzer_cl API
   52: call_to_missing_warning_includes_callsite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   53: 
   54:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
   55:     PltBase = plt_base_file(PrivDir),
   56:     Plt = filename:join(PrivDir, "previously_defined.plt"),
   57: 
   58:     {ok, BeamFileForPlt} = compile(Config, previously_defined, []),
   59:     [] = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
   60:                       {files, [BeamFileForPlt]},
   61:                       {output_plt, Plt},
   62:                        {warnings, [no_unknown]}]),
   63: 
   64:     {ok, Beam} = compile(Config, call_to_missing_example, []),
   65:     Opts =
   66:         #options{
   67:             analysis_type = succ_typings,
   68:             init_plts = [Plt, PltBase],
   69:             output_file = none,
   70:             get_warnings = true,
   71:             legal_warnings = ordsets:from_list([warn_unknown, warn_callgraph]),
   72:             erlang_mode = true,
   73:             files = [Beam]
   74:         },
   75:     Res = dialyzer_cl:start(Opts),
   76: 
   77:     ?assertMatch(
   78:         {2, [
   79:             {warn_callgraph, {_Filename, {5, 5}}, {
   80:                 call_to_missing, [
   81:                     previously_defined, function, 0
   82:                 ]
   83:             }}
   84:         ]},
   85:         Res),
   86: 
   87:     ok.
   88: 
   89: %% Test running Dialyzer programatically can yield unknown function
   90: %% errors with information on both the callsite and the unknown call
   91: %% itself.
   92: %% Missing function logic is tested elsewhere, but here we're specifically
   93: %% interested in the details of the error that are accessible from the
   94: %% dialyzer_cl API
   95: unknown_function_warning_includes_callsite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96: 
   97:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
   98:     PltBase = plt_base_file(PrivDir),
   99: 
  100:     {ok, Beam} = compile(Config, unknown_function_example, []),
  101:     Opts =
  102:         #options{
  103:             analysis_type = succ_typings,
  104:             init_plts = [PltBase],
  105:             output_file = none,
  106:             get_warnings = true,
  107:             legal_warnings = ordsets:from_list([warn_unknown, warn_callgraph]),
  108:             erlang_mode = true,
  109:             files = [Beam]
  110:         },
  111:     Res = dialyzer_cl:start(Opts),
  112: 
  113:     ?assertMatch(
  114:         {2, [
  115:             {warn_unknown, {_Filename, {5,5}},
  116:                 {unknown_function, {
  117:                     does_not_exist, function, 0
  118:                 }}
  119:             }
  120:         ]},
  121:         Res),
  122: 
  123:     ok.
  124: 
  125: % See GitHub issue erlang/OTP #6850
  126: can_add_multiple_plts_to_another_plt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127: 
  128:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  129: 
  130:     StdlibPlt = filename:join(PrivDir, "stdlib.plt"),
  131:     ErtsPlt = filename:join(PrivDir, "erts.plt"),
  132:     OutputPlt = filename:join(PrivDir, "merged.plt"),
  133: 
  134:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  135:                       {apps, [stdlib]},
  136:                       {output_plt, StdlibPlt}]),
  137:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  138:                       {apps, [erts]},
  139:                       {output_plt, ErtsPlt}]),
  140:     ?assertEqual(
  141:        [],
  142:        dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_add},
  143:                      {apps, [erts, stdlib]},
  144:                      {plts, [ErtsPlt, StdlibPlt]},
  145:                      {output_plt, OutputPlt}])),
  146: 
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: compile(Config, Module, CompileOpts) ->
  150:     Source = lists:concat([Module, ".erl"]),
  151:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  152:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  153:     SrcFilename = filename:join([DataDir, Source]),
  154:     Opts = [{outdir, PrivDir}, debug_info | CompileOpts],
  155:     {ok, Module} = compile:file(SrcFilename, Opts),
  156:     {ok, filename:join([PrivDir, lists:concat([Module, ".beam"])])}.
